thoughts.text: I will use the 'list_files' command to list the contents of the current directory and see if the file I need is present.
thoughts.reasoning: I need to check if the file I need exists in the current directory before I can read its contents.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'list_files' command to list the contents of the current directory.
- Check if the file I need is present in the list of files returned by the 'list_files' command.
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful to specify the correct directory when using the 'list_files' command.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'list_files' command to list the contents of the current directory and see if the file I need is present.
